titleInfo.title: Plan of survey of subdivision of lots 3 & 4 on Hannah and Cherry Streets known as the Brick Yard Track in Springers Survey

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 34 x 44 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: Manuscript map. Cartographer unknown. "Scale 20 Feet = 1 Inch". Shows Cherry Street [now Ferguson Avenue], Hannah Street [now Charlton Avenue], and 7 numbered lots. The north arrow is pointing down and to the left. "No 73 Drawer 6" is handwritten in the top left corner. "171" is circled in the bottom left corner.
